News.headline: 50/50 Draw Guiseley AFC
News.short_description: The Winner for the Daggers' Vanarama National League game versus Guisley AFC is ticket number 05352.
News.description:
The winning ticket worth £190.00 was drawn at half time. The winning ticket was claimed by Steve Wiffin.

Second place winner for the £50 Johnstone's Paint voucher is ticket number 05354, which has yet to be claimed.

The third place winner for the copy of Football Manager 2017 (PC) is ticket number 05562, the ticket was claimed by Russell Lee.

50/50 tickets can be purchased on match days for £1.
